content.description: Stricker's Revenge is a burly problem that starts on a slight overhang. It is an obvious start on the rocky crimp. work hands up along the remaining crimps and keep feet on the face. Then  top out over a slopper filled slab with barely any recognizable holds. Caution, large boulder right in front of climb make sure to have  a crash pad and spotter.
content.location: Right off trail from Rocky Hollow Picnic Area or follow trail for Tower Parking and walk toward Rocky Hollow Parking. Can be found in between The Wall and Bird Watchers Boulder. You may have to jump small stream depending on weather

pathTokens: Rocky Hollow Area at Garret Mountain

content.description: The Black Dynamite Boulder is a small unsuspecting boulder. Stricker's Revenge is a burly problem that starts on a slight overhang then forces to to top out over a slopper filled slab with barely any recognizable holds. Caution, large boulder right in front of climb make sure to have  a crash pad and spotter.
